documents.document: @oneforthedr better be steak and cheese.
@MataiGG @FlyAirNZ @YouTube haha, that's a blast from the past!
Hi @FlyAirNZ. Leanne on flight NZ5092 is awesome! I got on the plane and realised I still had the rental car keys. She sorted it all out!

Hours after @theHoltBolt says she plans to run for the Greens in Helensville, @johnkeypm resigns.
NZ drops a catch and Taylor says it was a regulation chance. Aus drops a catch and Taylor says it was a very difficult chance. #ausvnz
@Tim_Watkin @tmurphyNZ @NZNationalParty maybe shows Labour not as good as pushing the right message?
@tmurphyNZ @Tim_Watkin officially Nats were saying they had no chance, behind scenes I imagine they were telling media Little's in trouble
@tmurphyNZ @Tim_Watkin I think it's shows the impressive ability of @NZNationalParty to play the game.
It's one thing to make high tackles but murdering people is next level. https://t.co/e4pgRhrhJ2
@EQKaikoura Hi. This information is not correct. There is no loss of service - https://t.co/VJtYz7gvPH

@royceyoung @BenJStrang the bloke can't win. The media talk him up and then when he doesn't meet your expectations you knock him down.
Man, that one just kept rolling. Thankfully the kids are asleep #eqnz

Man, that was a decent aftershock just then #eqnz
.@NZGetThru @WREMOinfo fellas, you might want to have a chat and agree on what the actual story is https://t.co/0veoJwDG0M
@demelzaleslie haha. My youngest didn't even wake up! Holy shit, that was horrible.
That was big enough for me to scoop up the kids and get under the doorway. Hold shit! #eqnz
Woah that was massive! #eqnz
@Rachel_Smalley it's now 77%!
@gmoney_nz We need to go one year.
I see Richie McCaw was at today's @AllBlacks game. Looks like McCaw's @Olympics curse is contagious! https://t.co/dAY6dCeulL
@BrianODriscoll brilliant win mate. Looking forward to the rematch in a couple of weeks!
Well done @IrishRugby. That was a brilliant performance from your lads. Can't wait for the rematch in a couple of weeks. #IREvNZL
Justin Marshall:"The crowd are on their feet and so are players." I'm no expert but I think the players were already on their feet #NZLvIRE

Hey @hamishandandy, you up for this Kiwi eating challenge? @TimaruHerald
@Daveburgess13 @GabitesJason be careful. He's a dodgy bugger! And even more dodgy on the footy field.
@Daveburgess13 @GabitesJason how do you lads know each other? Dave, I played footy with Gabs in Timaru. Gabs, I worked with Dave at the Dom
Encouraging first half from the All Whites. Just lacking a bit of composure on the ball at times but they're playing well #MEXvNZL
This is bloody horrendous. Great work @kirsty_johnston https://t.co/9a0pyv9hMu
@Sportsfreakconz @GuyHeveldt haha, I get the feeling you have had that photo stored and ready for use for a while!
@GuyHeveldt oh agree with you completely. The ex journo in me feels a bit embarrassed with some of the coverage today.
@GuyHeveldt tough one for him. He was asked directly by media. If he refused comment he would've probably been labelled as backing Smith.
Good perspective here from @mattrichens https://t.co/eeoGCyeg6x
@NZStuffSport and if you're going to name Smith's partner, why don't you name the witness?
. @NZStuffSport is it really necessary to name Aaron Smith's partner in the story?
@MrJoshThomson @7DaysTv3 @JeremyCorbett or you could do a special version of Yes Minister - Yes Dad.
@MrJoshThomson you've got to get your old man on @7DaysTv3
@MrJoshThomson @UrzilaCarlson brilliant! That toast combination sounds bloody horrendous, though!
@DuncanGarnerNZ @RadioLIVENZ he had to front. if he didn't, you probably would have written a column demanding he resign for not fronting.
@AnaSamways my brother's teacher once put the class in a horse float to take them on camp. That was pretty normal on the West Coast though!

@Andrew_Mulligan @Primetv_NZ @CrowdGoesWildNZ easily my favourite show. It's been underrated for years!

@boxcarfred if rowing is under pressure, Swimming NZ must be shitting themselves.

Can someone please make sure Richie McCaw doesn't go to the rowing today. #Rio2016
I could watch this all day. https://t.co/M5v5tSBbie
@Andrew_Mulligan @cucomiris don't let them get to you Mulls. You're doing a cracking job over there.

Bloody oath! https://t.co/yXaWkUWhS0
How good would these Fiji boys be if played played in the NRL? Their offloads would create havoc. #Rio2016
@AndrewGourdie @prestonjscott the reaction to that if he got the job would be brilliant! Appears there has been no obvious succession plan?
@AndrewGourdie @NewshubSport @nz7s @NewshubNZ he's been great but now's the time for a refresh.
@richirvine @Sportsfreakconz part of me has always quietly liked the thought of Fiji winning gold anyway!
@Sportsfreakconz @richirvine I'm not sure why everyone's so upset. We've been average all year and this has just been a continuation of that
Been up watching the Olympics for an hour. Just enough time to see us choke in the equestrian and lose to Japan in the rugby. Back to bed!
@Andrew_Mulligan thought you did a great job interviewing Lauren Boyle. Could have been one of the most awkward interviews ever!

Hi @skysportnz. Just wondering if the Olympics will be shown on Fan Pass (including pop up channels)? Keen to give you some money.
